special_abilities.name: Lightfooted.
descriptions: The swashbuckler can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

special_abilities.name: Suave Defense.
descriptions: While the swashbuckler is wearing light or no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Charisma modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The swashbuckler makes three attacks: one with a dagger and two with its rapier.

actions.name: Dagger.
descriptions: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4+4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rapier.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8+4) piercing damage.
